childElements.name: EmployeeHandbookSignature
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12, "label" : "Employee Handbook Signature", "show" : null, "conditionType" : "Hide if False", "hide" : false, "lwcName" : "runtime_industries_assessment__signature", "designerElementName" : "Signature", "bStandalone" : false, "customAttributes" : [ ], "componentHeader" : "Signature" }

childElements.name: HR_Provide_Signature
childElements.propertySetConfig: { "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "Please provide your signature", "text" : "Please provide your signature", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HREHR_AcknowledgementText1
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "The employee handbook describes important information about [Company Name], and I\nunderstand that I should consult human resources regarding any questions not answered in the\nhandbook. I have entered into my employment relationship with [Company Name] voluntarily\nand acknowledge that there is no specified length of employment. Accordingly, either I or\n[Company Name] can terminate the relationship at will, with or without cause, at any\ntime, so long as there is not violation of applicable federal or state law.", "text" : "The employee handbook describes important information about [Company Name], and I
understand that I should consult human resources regarding any questions not answered in the
handbook. I have entered into my employment relationship with [Company Name] voluntarily
and acknowledge that there is no specified length of employment. Accordingly, either I or
[Company Name] can terminate the relationship at will, with or without cause, at any
time, so long as there is not violation of applicable federal or state law.", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HREHR_AcknowledgementText2
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "I understand and agree that no manager, supervisor, or representative of [Company Name] has\nany authority to enter into any agreement for employment other than at-will. Only the President\nof the company has the authority to make any such agreement and then only in writing signed\nby the President of [Company Name].", "text" : "I understand and agree that no manager, supervisor, or representative of [Company Name] has
any authority to enter into any agreement for employment other than at-will. Only the President
of the company has the authority to make any such agreement and then only in writing signed
by the President of [Company Name].", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HREHR_AcknowledgementText3
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "This manual and the policies and procedures contained herein supersede any and all prior\npractices, oral or written representations, or statements regarding the terms and conditions of\nyour employment with [Company Name]. By distributing this handbook, [Company Name]\nexpressly revokes any and all previous policies and procedures which are inconsistent with\nthose contained herein.", "text" : "This manual and the policies and procedures contained herein supersede any and all prior
practices, oral or written representations, or statements regarding the terms and conditions of
your employment with [Company Name]. By distributing this handbook, [Company Name]
expressly revokes any and all previous policies and procedures which are inconsistent with
those contained herein.", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HREHR_AcknowledgementText4
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "I understand that, except for employment at-will status, any and all policies and practices may\nbe changed at any time by [Company Name], and the company reserves the right to change my\nhours, wages and working conditions at any time. All such changes will be communicated\nthrough official notices, and I understand that revised information may supersede, modify, or\neliminate existing policies.", "text" : "I understand that, except for employment at-will status, any and all policies and practices may
be changed at any time by [Company Name], and the company reserves the right to change my
hours, wages and working conditions at any time. All such changes will be communicated
through official notices, and I understand that revised information may supersede, modify, or
eliminate existing policies.", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HREHR_AcknowledgementText5
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "I understand and agree that nothing in the employee handbook creates, or is intended to\ncreate, a promise or representation of continued employment and that employment at\n[Company Name] is employment at-will, which may be terminated at the will of either\n[Company Name] or myself. Furthermore, I acknowledge that this handbook is neither a\ncontract of employment nor a legal document. I understand and agree that employment and\ncompensation may be terminated with or without cause and with or without notice at any time by\n[Company Name] or myself.", "text" : "I understand and agree that nothing in the employee handbook creates, or is intended to
create, a promise or representation of continued employment and that employment at
[Company Name] is employment at-will, which may be terminated at the will of either
[Company Name] or myself. Furthermore, I acknowledge that this handbook is neither a
contract of employment nor a legal document. I understand and agree that employment and
compensation may be terminated with or without cause and with or without notice at any time by
[Company Name] or myself.", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }

childElements.name: HREHR_AcknowledgementText6
childElements.propertySetConfig:
{ "controlWidth" : 12.0, "label" : "I have received the handbook, and I understand that it is my responsibility to read and comply\nwith the policies contained in this handbook and any revisions made to it.", "text" : "I have received the handbook, and I understand that it is my responsibility to read and comply
with the policies contained in this handbook and any revisions made to it.", "show" : null, "dataJSON" : false, "HTMLTemplateId" : "", "textKey" : "", "sanitize" : false }
